metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0380 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The rend_service_intro_established function in or/rendservice.c in Torbefore 0.2.8.15, 0.2.9.x before 0.2.9.12, 0.3.0.x before 0.3.0.11, 0.3.1.xbefore 0.3.1.7, and 0.3.2.x before 0.3.2.1-alpha, when SafeLogging isdisabled, allows attackers to obtain sensitive information by leveragingaccess to the log files of a hidden service, because uninitialized stackdata is included in an error message about construction of an introductionpoint circuit.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.2
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.9.14-1ubuntu1~16.04.2').
